title: Merchants of Death (Eclipse)
description:
The Eclipse Comics Upload Project pops the clutch and tells you to eat its dust with 'Merchants of Death'!

MoD was a four-issue magazine published by Eclipse in 1988, centering on soldier-of-fortune/adventure type tales. It contained 40 story pages, most in black and white, and featured three stories per issue, a mix of established European creators and up-and-coming American ones (Kurt Busiek and Dan Brerton).

As usual, praise to the creators and the scanners! Get you it, seed you it!
